rukus.text: Sab tareef Allah Taalaa kay liye hai jo tamam jahanon ka palney wala hai
Bara meharban nihayat reham kerney wala
Badlay kay din (yani qayamat) ka maalik hai

Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 107.1. Kiya tu nay(ussay bhi)dekha jo (roz) jaza ko jhutlata hai? 107.2. yehi who hai jo yateem ko dhakkay deta hai 107.3. Aur miskeen ko khilaney ki targeeb nahi deta 107.4. Un namazion kay liey afsos(aur well nami jahanum ki jagah)hai
Jo apni namaz say ghafil hain
Aur baratnay ki chez roktay hain
